releases.name: v1.0.2
releases.body: - add 1 isolate for Tobacco mosaic virus

releases.name: v1.0.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- Added Apple rubbery wood virus 1
- Added Apple rubbery wood virus 2
- Added Grapevine virus H
- Added 23 isolates for Grapevine virus T
- Added 4 isolates for Grapevine leafroll-associated virus 1
- Added 5 isolates for Grapevine leafroll-associated virus 2
- Added 13 isolates for Grapevine leafroll-associated virus 3
- Added 12 isolates for Grapevine pinot gris virus
- Added 1 isolate for Grapevine syrah virus
- Added 1 isolate for Raspberry bushy dwarf virus
- Added more Tomato ringspot virus isolates
- Removed 1 Apricot latent virus isolate

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
- added all Genbank isolates for ASPV
- fixed isolate names from some poorly named isolates
- removed viruses and isolates used by the developers that haven't yet been published to Genbank
- separated Apple stem pitting (ASPV) and Apricot latent viruses (ApLV)

latest.name: v0.2.1
latest.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles

releases.name: v0.2.1
releases.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
- the first release using TravisCI for building and testing
- merge annotations and profiles into one archive

latest.name: v4.2.1
latest.body:
# Fixed
- prevent application hang due to `ConnectionResetError`

releases.name: v4.2.1
releases.body:
# Fixed
- prevent application hang due to `ConnectionResetError`

releases.name: v4.2.0
releases.body:
# Fixed
* Resolved failure when analyzing legacy samples

releases.name: v4.2.0-beta.2
releases.body:
# Added
- compress legacy samples in the background (#2154)

# Changed
- improve usability of isolate and sequence download links
- improve startup time by removing unnecessary database and file checks (#2156)

# Fixed
- fix non-functional sequence FASTA download link (#2155)

releases.name: v4.2.0-beta.1
releases.body:
# Changed
- improve user experience when selecting barcode targets and genome segments

# Fixed
- fixed unuseable target field when adding barcode reference sequences

releases.name: v4.1.2
releases.body:
# Fixed
- fix failing analyses for legacy samples
- updated dependencies to resolve security issues

releases.name: v4.1.1
releases.body:
# Fixed
- fix exception about missing `dnspython` package (#1923)
- fix exception on start related to the `indexes` collection not existing (#1935)
- fix jobs for the same sample failing when run concurrently (#1877)
- fix subtractions disappearing immediately after creation (#1939)
- fix only the first subtraction being selectable in the quick analysis dialog (#1891)

releases.name: v4.1.0
releases.body:
# Changed
- add gap between vertically stack info bubbles in reference list items
- improve accessibility of dropdowns (#1912)

# Fixed
- fix application crash in browser when user attempts to edit an OTU (#1917)
- fix problem where dropdown wouldn't open when clicked (#1912, #1906)
- fix situation where uploaded file would still be visible in list when upload was aborted (#1908)

releases.name: v4.0.2
releases.body:
# Changed
- resolve security issues in browser client

releases.name: v4.0.1
releases.body:
# Fixed
- fix error on start related to `static` path

releases.name: v4.0.0
releases.body:
Changes below are collated from all pre-releases.

# Added
- add barcode-based analysis workflow based on AODP
- allow subtraction renaming
- allow deletion of any subtraction, not just unused ones
- automatically reconnect when server connection is lost (#1787, #1673 
- check MongoDB version on start and exit if it is not supported
- improved quick analysis dialog with support for multiple sample library types
- improve analysis retrieval using caching
- make default subtractions for samples optional
- report MongoDB version in API responses
- show support and upgrade information to Home view
- support for amplicon sample library types
- support for barcode references

# Changed
- always show _Pathoscope_ instead of _PathoscopeBowtie_
- improve appearance and consistency of user interface
- format JSON returned from HTTP API appropriately depending on the request's `Accept` header
- replace the term _Algorithm_ with _Workflow_
- overhaul setup user interface

# Fixed
- fix poor performance during file uploads
- fix missing cache link in analysis viewers
- fix user sessions expiring too early
- prevent misleading fatal git error from writing to console during startup
